Cleaning up code.
Code nuked. It is broken. Needs to be fixed. Previous version worked. AFAIR.

Code seems to compile. Question is : does it work ?

Next step: making the Sum Number Page dynamic, so that it can extract something from the URL.

=> Sunday, 18 August 2019 3.43.29 :
The question-marks have been filled in, the getEntityRoute is "ready", i.e. it compiles. Now the create entity route should be created too, after that an integration test started from the client side (running inside node.js using jsdom "emulator"), started in sbt by typing "test".
Bit of refactoring. Making same testing data available to both sides: client and server. Renaming a few things. Creating URI friendly encoding for JSON strings.
Bit of refactoring. Making same testing data available to both sides: client and server. Renaming a few things. Creating URI friendly encoding for JSON strings.
Commit before trying to parametrize over request type.
Using POST for all communication.

=> Sunday, 18 August 2019 3.43.29 :
The question-marks have been filled in, the getEntityRoute is "ready", i.e. it compiles. Now the create entity route should be created too, after that an integration test started from the client side (running inside node.js using jsdom "emulator"), started in sbt by typing "test".
Bit of refactoring. Making same testing data available to both sides: client and server. Renaming a few things. Creating URI friendly encoding for JSON strings.
Commit before trying to parametrize over request type.
Using POST for all communication.
